subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Red Sox executives met with Mark Teixeira and his agent Scott Boras this week, the team shifted from being the favorites to sign Teixeira to hinting that they were out of the negotiations.
snippet: After Red Sox executives met with Mark Teixeira and his agent Scott Boras this week, the team shifted from being the favorites to sign Teixeira to hinting that they were out of the negotiations.
